paragraphs.text:
import org.apache.spark.graphx.Edge
import org.apache.spark.graphx.Graph

val graphDF = sqlContext.read
  .format("com.databricks.spark.csv")
  .option("header", "false")
  .load("/root/pipeline/datasets/graph/dijkstra.csv")
  .toDF("userId1", "userId2", "cost")
  
// Edges has a cost that we're trying to minimize
val connectionEdgesRDD = graphDF.map(row => {
  Edge(row(0).toString.toLong, row(1).toString.toLong, row(2).toString.toDouble)
})

val graph = Graph.fromEdges(connectionEdgesRDD, 0L)

result.msg:

import org.apache.spark.graphx.Graph

paragraphs.title: Run Dijkstra on the entire graph From the given source
paragraphs.text:
import com.advancedspark.ml.graph.Dijkstra

val src = 10002

val shortestPathGraph = Dijkstra.run(graph, src)
